title: Huge Kubernetes extension guide needs to improve user experience
body:
### Description

https://quarkus.io/guides/deploying-to-kubernetes / Kubernetes extension guide is quite huge and it's getting more troublesome to find the details in it. I personally gave up when looking for the answer for https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/33724#issuecomment-1600306634

`docs/src/main/asciidoc/deploying-to-kubernetes.adoc` has almost 1700 lines + there is a huge number of config properties in the rendered guide

```
curl https://quarkus.io/guides/deploying-to-kubernetes 2>/dev/null | html2text | wc -l 
    9594
```


### Implementation ideas

The only idea I have atm is to list the config properties in separate document and reference that doc from `deploying-to-kubernetes` guide. 

CC @iocanel @geoand @Sgitario
